website_summaries.verdict: Through and through comfortable—this is likely what many would say the instant they try the Choprock Strap for themselves. Adventurers who would take a chance on this good-looking sandal might also rave about its stellar surface traction and fantastic arch support. Unfortunately, this strappy hiker is not offered in wide—a real disappointment for those who have bulky feet. Nevertheless, the Merrell Choprock Strap is a remarkable hiking companion what with all its list of trail-specific qualities.
pros: Numerous consumers admire the Merrell Choprock Strap greatly when it comes to comfort
Many testers of this high-quality hiking sandal adore its super-sticky Vibram outsole
The Choprock Strap has a very supportive arch zone, according to a decent number of reviewers
Some customers appreciate the cool aesthetics of this Merrell hiker
Based on a report, this sandal-type footgear has incredible durability
cons: Several users find the Merrell Choprock Strap sandal not being offered in wide a missed opportunity
The shoe’s heel strap has a nasty habit of slipping out of place and under the heel, according to a couple of testers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable hiking sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are lightweight and really comfortable, actually they appear to be the most comfortable sandals that I have ever had! I like the fact they have grip on wet surfaces. They area gd colour so won't loose them in a hurry! I'm sure they will last for many years. All in all another great product from merrell
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Merrell footwear for a number of years, and each time I am more than satisfied with the product. I have large feet (size 14) and Merrell always have something in stock to suit me. They never give me blisters, and they last for a good while. In the event they don't, Merrell offer 365-day no quibble returns (which I've been happy to use once or twice) and they will honour this, even if purchased through Amazon (though you'll need to send it back to Amazon and pressure them to process the return, they won't give it to you without it)
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bit of a faff to put on
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the Merrills I had for 10 years on the advert they looked the nearest thing Upside Very comfortable to wear I do a lot of country walking. Well made and stylish Downside Getting them on is a bit of a faf due to the elastics yes heal and mid strap compared to straight forward Velcro. However the elasticated part makes them secure and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tazz

customer_reviews.title: Pure comfort
customer_reviews.text: Having cheaped out on previous sandals and suffered the consequences I thought I would try Merrell as I have found their trainers to be very comfortable. I have had achilles issues for years and these sandals are pure comfort. Only time will tell as to whether they are excellent value but I would hope for many service from them as they are far from cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DA71

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough for walking any distance
customer_reviews.text: The heal strap kept falling so I had to stitch it. The straps bite because of lack of padding; too narrow so you have to keep tugging it back into place. Sorry but for the price not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Neal

customer_reviews.title: Good value and well made, fully adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Previously had Merrells so went for the same make. These are very comfortable and have three means of adjustment, width at toes, length of foot at heel and strap across arch of foot. The elasticated inserts under each strap prevent the strap from rubbing on the skin. Can be worn with or without socks of any thickness and can be adjusted to compensate. The soles are thicker than sandals normally are and provide greater comfort over rough or uneven ground. I got nine years wear out of my previous pair and these will easily match that!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove on the feet
customer_reviews.text: Had to get used to undoing from the other side to my last pair. The neoprene padding means you cannot slip them on as easy as previously. However the comfort factor has improved a very great deal
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stephen Conquest

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: After a few walks, the stitching around the buckle came undone, with buckle coming loose. cant send back as abroad. dont waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sussex

customer_reviews.title: Good sandals but fiddly
customer_reviews.text: These are well made sandals but I did not like the elasticated in steps. A bit fiddly and thought they would deteriorate after use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G T Young

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product - not to the usual standard for Merrell
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when the first pair of sandals I received had not been stitched properly with one of the Velcro straps loose in the box. So I was even more put out when the second pair had a excessively long strap that rendered it unuseable. What’s happened to the quality control? Very poor when you are spending this much money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J H Keveth

customer_reviews.title: Well made and well designed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bit pricey for a seasonal shoes but it worth it, you gotta wear it to know what I am talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit fiddly to get right - but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Phian

customer_reviews.title: REFUND REQUESTED
customer_reviews.text: Extremely oversize and impossible to wear tho marked as my size.
customer_reviews.author: MR A M R THOMSEN

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable sandals , the last merrel sandals I had, lasted years , these seem to be well built as well
customer_reviews.author: Imtiyaz

customer_reviews.title: Good trekking sandals
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfortable and sturdy in all the right places, time will tell. Merrell have never disappointed before!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Stuttard

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Merrell hiking boots, so why not try their sandals? Initially I thought they were too small, however this was only getting the straps sorted. Really comfy. Let's see when we do the first big walk in them. I'm looking forward to something I can hopefully wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ex Second row.

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Choprock Strap Hiking Sandals
product_meta.description: For days spent on trails around water, this capable hiking sandal is packed with considered materials that dry out fast, grip on slick terrain, and protect your feet from debris. Features water-friendly synthetic and webbing upper Nine hook and three point straps for secure fit compression moulded contoured eva footbed and midsole vibram megagrip outsole 5mm lug depth.
feature_bullets: Water-Friendly Synthetic and Webbing Upper- Quick-drying fabrics that are comfortable next to the skin when both wet and dry.
Nine Hook and Three-Point Strap- Offers a secure fit that is easily adjustable.
Moulded EVA Midsole- Targeted cushioned comfort for maximum support and protection.
Vibram Megagrip- High-performance rubber for durability, stability, and slip resistance on wet and dry surfaces.
3.5mm Lugs- Full range of motions in all directions and durable traction.
